languages.text: "Спросили б меня раньше, что вероятнее: что я запишусь в монахини, или наш булыжник закрутит роман с Лорд-капитаном, я бы купила четки".
"If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."
languages.original_text: "Спросили б меня раньше, что вероятнее: что я запишусь в монахини, или наш булыжник закрутит роман с Лорд-капитаном, я бы купила четки".

traits.locale_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

"If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

languages.text: 「あたいが修道女になるか、それとも堅物マスターがロード・キャプテンとうまくやるか、もし前に『どちらがより起こりそうか』と聞かれたら、あたいは祈祷用の数珠を買いに行ったでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

traits.locale_text: 「あたいが修道女になるか、それとも堅物マスターがロード・キャプテンとうまくやるか、もし前に『どちらがより起こりそうか』と聞かれたら、あたいは祈祷用の数珠を買いに行ったでしょうね」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr mich zuvor gefragt hättet, was wahrscheinlicher ist – dass ich eine Nonne werde oder Meister Spielverderber mit dem Lord Captain zusammenkommt –, dann wäre ich losgezogen und hätte mir Gebetsperlen gekauft."
languages.original_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mich zuvor gefragt hättet, was wahrscheinlicher ist – dass ich eine Nonne werde oder Meister Spielverderber mit dem Lord Captain zusammenkommt –, dann wäre ich losgezogen und hätte mir Gebetsperlen gekauft."

languages.text: «Si me hubieran preguntado si era más probable que el maestro aguafiestas y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán acabaran liándose o que yo me metiera a monja, me habría comprado ya las cuentas para rezar».
languages.original_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

traits.locale_text: «Si me hubieran preguntado si era más probable que el maestro aguafiestas y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán acabaran liándose o que yo me metiera a monja, me habría comprado ya las cuentas para rezar».

languages.text: “换做以前，如果你问我哪件事情更可能发生——是我当上修女，还是泼冷水大师和咱们的舰长大人变成一对儿？我肯定会赶紧给自己买串念珠戴上。”
languages.original_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

traits.locale_text: “换做以前，如果你问我哪件事情更可能发生——是我当上修女，还是泼冷水大师和咱们的舰长大人变成一对儿？我肯定会赶紧给自己买串念珠戴上。”

languages.text: "Önceden bana, benim rahibe olmam mı yoksa Oyunbozan Efendi'nin Lord Kaptan'la iyi geçinmesi mi daha olası diye sorsaydın gider kendime tespih alırdım."
languages.original_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

traits.locale_text: "Önceden bana, benim rahibe olmam mı yoksa Oyunbozan Efendi'nin Lord Kaptan'la iyi geçinmesi mi daha olası diye sorsaydın gider kendime tespih alırdım."

languages.original_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

languages.text: « Si vous m'aviez demandé ce qui avait le plus de chances d'arriver, entre devenir une nonne ou que maître Rabat-joie s'entende avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, je serais partie m'acheter un chapelet de prière. »
languages.original_text: "If you'd asked me before what was more likely to happen — me becoming a nun or Master Killjoy hitting it off with the Lord Captain — I would have gone and bought me some prayer beads."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous m'aviez demandé ce qui avait le plus de chances d'arriver, entre devenir une nonne ou que maître Rabat-joie s'entende avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, je serais partie m'acheter un chapelet de prière. »
